Headline: #18 16th-18th, #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary West Reroute near Ogden/Campbell
ShortDescription: Westbound 18 16th-18th, 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily near Ogden/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 18 16th-18th, 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily near Ogden/Campbell.

Buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, California and Ogden including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Ogden & Campbell.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
